visionSection.title: HITEK'S VISION
visionSection.mainStatement: Hitek's long-term goal is to become a world-leading software tool
visionSection.description: Hitek Software continuously strives to research new technologies every day to achieve the goal of becoming a world-leading software tool.

messageSection.title: CHAIRMAN'S MESSAGE
messageSection.mainGoal: HITEK'S LONG-TERM GOAL IS TO BECOME A WORLD-LEADING SOFTWARE COMPANY
paragraphs: Fortunately having the opportunity to work with many customers worldwide during the startup phase, I have accumulated extensive experience to understand customer needs in each country and each field they target.
I am building Hitek Software stronger every day with that experience.

Hitek Software is a collection of young, energetic, and passionate individuals who are always ready to seek and adapt to new technologies. Therefore, we are confident that with our strength in quickly updating new technologies and knowledge, we can satisfy the requirements that Hitek's customers present.

In addition to our young workforce, we also have consultants who are proficient in foreign languages and have deep expertise in technology, which helps eliminate language barriers between Hitek and foreign customers. This has also been the formula for Hitek Software to approach and partner with many customers worldwide for over 5 years.

image.alt: Chairman of Hitek Software - Tran Anh Khoi

messageSection.quote: Continuous innovation, continuous development - Leading a passionate young team to reach global standards

us.title: About Us
us.description: Expert team, company culture and core values

description.text1: Discover the journey from a startup with 5 engineers to a global technology company
description.highlight: with the mission to become the world's leading software partner

introTexts: Hitek was established in 2018, a long enough journey for us to affirm our position in the current technology market.
Hitek's future goal is not only to be the best software development company in Vietnam, but also to be a leading software company in the World!

items.title: Hitek Founded
items.description: Hitek was established with only 5 software engineers, working freelance, focusing on web and mobile app development for the Vietnamese market.

items.title: Going Global
items.description: Receiving the first software outsourcing contract for the Korean market, Hitek changed its business strategy to expand to foreign markets.

items.title: Korean Market Focus
items.description: We continued to develop technology in Korea. Nearly 90% of projects came from this market.

items.title: Globalization
items.description: Hitek provides software outsourcing services and software products for customers from the US, Canada, Germany, Korea, Australia, Japan.

mission.title: Next Mission
mission.description: Continue expanding to new markets, enhancing AI research and advanced technologies, constantly improving service quality to become a reliable technology partner globally.

header.title: HITEK SOFTWARE IMPLEMENTS CSR
header.description: CSR stands for Corporate Social Responsibility, which is considered a global trend and has become a 'soft' requirement for businesses. To fulfill the obligations that a business and related individuals must perform for society to achieve the most positive impacts and minimize negative impacts on society. Hitek Software has been implementing the following items:

items.title: First
items.subtitle: Economic
items.description: Includes meeting social needs, increasing social welfare, ensuring business survival and development.

items.title: Second
items.subtitle: Legal
items.description: Businesses must fully comply with legal regulations for stakeholders, including shareholders, consumers, employees' families.

items.title: Third
items.subtitle: Ethical
items.description: Behaviors and activities that society expects from businesses, but are not regulated in the legal system.

items.title: Fourth
items.subtitle: Humanitarian
items.description: Businesses need to perform behaviors that demonstrate the desire to contribute to the community and society.

footer.title: Commitment to Sustainable Development
footer.description: Hitek Software continuously strives to implement social responsibility in all business activities, aiming for sustainable development and positive contributions to the community.

header.title: Sustainable Development Goals
paragraphs: Hitek Software has been establishing a global operational network, therefore we always focus on work quality at every step and stage.
Hitek's leadership also cares deeply about employees' lives, so we aim for appropriate goals within the 17 Sustainable Development Goals.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Hitek Software believes it will help improve quality of life, and we will continue to strive to realize a new modern society that is smarter and happier.

goals.title: Quality Education
goals.description: Ensure quality, inclusive and equitable education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all.
goals.hitekAction: Hitek Software regularly organizes training sessions for employees on programming knowledge and necessary soft skills for everyone during work.

goals.title: Decent Work and Economic Growth
goals.description: To achieve economic performance at the highest level, constantly improve and innovate technology, including focusing on high value-added and labor-intensive areas.
goals.hitekAction: Promote development-oriented policies to support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation.

goals.title: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure
goals.description: Create new technologies, focus on developing employees' most creative ideas.
goals.hitekAction: Always create conditions for employees to work in an environment with the best quality infrastructure facilities.

globalImpact.title: Global Impact
globalImpact.description: Through implementing sustainable development goals, Hitek Software not only contributes to the local community but also creates positive impacts on a global scale.

aboutSection.heading: Thank you for our customers' trust
aboutSection.subheading: Our journey is built on trust and collaboration from global partners, delivering excellent technology solutions and superior customer experiences.
aboutSection.title: Your Reliable Technology Partner
aboutSection.description1: HITEK is a leading technology company in Vietnam, specializing in providing software solutions and digital transformation services. With a team of experienced experts and advanced technology, we are committed to delivering high-quality products.
aboutSection.description2: Our mission is to drive creativity, accelerate innovation, partner for development and elevate success for every business.
aboutSection.ctaDescription: Let us help you realize your ideas with optimal technology solutions

stats.experienceDesc: Many years of experience have given us extensive knowledge across multiple industries, allowing us to provide the best digital experience solutions.
stats.clientsDesc: Over 80 global clients from around the world, including Korea, Japan, Canada, Australia and many others.
stats.projectsDesc: Projects completed for customers, delivering superior digital transformation experiences and optimal solutions.
stats.teamDesc: Talented team including digital experts, strategic thinkers, designers and creative developers.
